00001 // ORTDC3377tdcDecoder.cc

00003 #include "TROOT.h"
00004 #include "ORTDC3377tdcDecoder.hh"
00005 #include "ORUtils.hh"
00006 #include "ORLogger.hh"
00007 
00008 void ORTDC3377tdcDecoder::Swap(UInt_t* record)
00009 {
00010   ORUtils::Swap(record[1]); 
00011   /* Swap so we can tell if this is a single or double word timestamp.*/
00012   size_t startSwapFrom = 3;
00013   if (IsDoubleWordTimestamp(record)) {
00014     startSwapFrom = 4;
00015     ORUtils::Swap(record[2]);
00016     ORUtils::Swap(record[3]);
00017     UInt_t dummy = record[2];
00018     record[2] = record[3];
00019     record[3] = dummy;
00020   } else {
00021     ORUtils::Swap(record[2]);
00022   }
00023   /* the rest of the data is 16-bit packed into 32-bits. */
00024   UShort_t* shortPtr = (UShort_t*) (record+startSwapFrom);; 
00025   for (size_t i=0;i<LengthOf(record)-startSwapFrom;i++) {
00026     ORUtils::Swap(shortPtr[2*i]);
00027     ORUtils::Swap(shortPtr[2*i+1]);
00028   }
00029 }
00030 
00031 double ORTDC3377tdcDecoder::ReferenceDateOf(UInt_t* record)
00032 {
00033   double refDate = 0.0;
00034   if(IsDoubleWordTimestamp(record)) {
00035     refDate = (*((double*)(record+2)));
00036   }
00037   else  refDate = (double)(*((float*)(record + 2)));
00038   return refDate;
00039 }
00040 
00041 
00042 UInt_t ORTDC3377tdcDecoder::IthTDCValueOf(UInt_t* record, size_t i)
00043 {
00044   UShort_t* data = GetTDCLocPtr(record, i);
00045   if (IsDoubleWordFormat(record)) {
00046     if ( (data[0] & 0x0100) == 0) {
00047       ORLog(kWarning) << "First data word of double word format does not "
00048                       << "have the high-word bit set: crate " << CrateOf(record)
00049                       << ", card " << CardOf(record) << ", channel "
00050                       << IthChannelOf(record, i) << ", i = " << i << std::endl;
00051     }
00052     return ((data[0] & 0x00ff) << 8) | (data[1] & 0x00ff);
00053   }
00054   else {
00055     if (RecordsOnLeadingEdgeOnly(record)) return (data[0] & 0x03ff);
00056     else return (data[0] & 0x01ff);
00057   }
00058 }
00059 
00060 std::string ORTDC3377tdcDecoder::GetParName(size_t iPar)
00061 {
00062   switch(iPar) {
00063     case 0: return "crate";
00064     case 1: return "card";
00065     case 2: return "channel";
00066     case 3: return "tdc";
00067     case 4: return "edge";
00068     default:
00069       ORLog(kWarning) << "GetParName(): index (" << iPar
00070                       << ") out of range." << std::endl;
00071       return "unknown";
00072   }
00073 }
00074 
00075 UInt_t ORTDC3377tdcDecoder::GetPar(UInt_t* record, size_t iPar, size_t iRow)
00076 {
00077   switch(iPar) {
00078     case 0: return CrateOf(record);
00079     case 1: return CardOf(record);
00080     case 2: return IthChannelOf(record, iRow);
00081     case 3: return IthTDCValueOf(record, iRow);
00082     case 4: return IthTDCValueIsLeadingEdge(record, iRow);
00083     default:
00084       ORLog(kWarning) << "GetPar(): index (" << iPar
00085                       << ") out of range." << std::endl;
00086       return 0;
00087   }
00088 }
